query: select trim(cast("id" as varchar(10))) as "alfrescoId" from "dm_dim_alfresco" where "is_active"='Y'

select "description", "login", "password", "protocol" + '://' + "host" + ':' + "port" as base_url, 2 as "user_limit", "audit_limit", "node_limit", "workflow_limit" from "dm_dim_alfresco" where "id"=${alfrescoId}
